trans-unit.source: Provides data for the event that is raised when a faulted <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />'s exception goes unobserved.
trans-unit.target: 提供當未觀察到錯誤 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 的例外狀況時，所引發事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The Exception property is used to examine the exception without marking it as observed, whereas the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.UnobservedTaskExceptionEventArgs.SetObserved%2A> method is used to mark the exception as observed.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況屬性用來檢查例外狀況，而不將它標示為觀察到，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.UnobservedTaskExceptionEventArgs.SetObserved%2A>方法用來標示為觀察到的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Marking the exception as observed prevents it from triggering exception escalation policy which, by default, terminates the process.
trans-unit.target: 標示為觀察到的例外狀況會避免觸發例外狀況擴大原則，根據預設，終止處理序。

trans-unit.source: The Exception that has gone unobserved.
trans-unit.target: 已變成未觀察對象的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.UnobservedTaskExceptionEventArgs" /> class with the unobserved exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用未觀察的例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.UnobservedTaskExceptionEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。
變成未觀察到的例外狀況。
變成未觀察到的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether this exception has been marked as "observed."
trans-unit.target: 取得這個例外狀況是否已標記為「已觀察」。

trans-unit.source: true if this exception has been marked as "observed"; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個例外狀況已標記為「已觀察」則為 true，否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: Marks the <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.UnobservedTaskExceptionEventArgs.Exception" /> as "observed," thus preventing it from triggering exception escalation policy which, by default, terminates the process.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.UnobservedTaskExceptionEventArgs.Exception" /> 標記為「已觀察」，讓其無法觸發例外狀況擴大原則 (此原則預設會讓處理序結束)。
